title: Radhika Coomaraswamy named Laureate of the Fondation Chirac Special Jury Prize 2012
content: Former Under Secretary General of the United Nations/Special Representative for Children and Armed Conflict Radhika Coomaraswamy was chosen for the Special Jury Prize 2012 by the Fondation Chirac (Chirac Foundation), states a press release from the Sri Lankan Embassy in Paris….
